name: A New Start!
description:
Have you always wanted to experience the horrors of being on welfare?
Have you never had the lack of money to do so? Well congratulations! This game let's you experience the full range of devastating effects on your physical, mental, and emotional health that you've been missing. For only $2 you can know what it's like to be on the most ineffective system of welfare Australia has had in decades! Buy this product now!
